typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	partdistFrom as string
}
source(output(
		ntt_govukidentifier as string,
		organizationid as string,
		ntt_personalisation as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_businessunit as string,
		ntt_templatetype as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_notificationtemplateid as string,
		ntt_description as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTNotificationTemplateId as string,
		strNTTGovUkIdentifier as string,
		strNTTIdentifier as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		strNTTDescription as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/notifications/notificationtemplate') ~> sourceODS
dcolSQL alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSQL
FilterODS select(mapColumn(
		batch_id = intBatchId,
		partdist,
		isValid = blIsValid,
		modifiedon = tsModifiedOn,
		createdon = tsCreatedOn,
		ntt_notificationtemplateid = strNTTNotificationTemplateId,
		ntt_govukidentifier = strNTTGovUkIdentifier,
		ntt_identifier = strNTTIdentifier,
		ntt_name = strNTTName,
		ntt_description = strNTTDescription,
		isTruncate = blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectODS
SelectODS derive(ntt_notificationtemplateid = coalesce(ntt_notificationtemplateid, 'unknown')) ~> dcolSQL
sourceODS filter(partdist >= toDate($partdistFrom)) ~> FilterODS
AlterRowSQL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ntt_notificationtemplateid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSQL
